sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react" import "./Info.css" export default class Info extends Component { render() { let { isServerConnected,isPotConnected,humidity, tempurature,lightness,weight,ph,speaker,motor,waterpump1,waterpump2} = this.props return (
Connection State
Server: {isServerConnected ? "connected" : "disconnected"}
Pot: {isPotConnected ? "connected" : "disconnected"}
Plant Type
Tpye: 
Pot Sensor Reading
Dirt humidity: {humidity}
Tempurature: {tempurature}
Lightness: {lightness}
Weight: {weight}
pH Value: {ph}
Utility State
Speaker: 100%
Gear and Motor: {motor ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
Water Pump 1: {waterpump1 ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
Water Pump 2: {waterpump2 ? "Operating" : "Stopped"}
) } }
